reviews.text:
I visited the florist section today at around 7 PM to purchase roses for my wife‚Äôs birthday and was assisted by Nichi. I was looking for a bouquet with 5 rose stalks and baby‚Äôs breath, but unfortunately, only 3 stalks were readily available. Nichi went above and beyond by personally selecting and matching additional stalks to complete the bouquet beautifully.

Her dedication, attention to detail, and outstanding customer service truly impressed me. Thanks to her efforts, I left the store with a lovely bouquet and a happy heart. Nichi is truly an asset to your outlet, and I sincerely appreciate her kindness and commitment.

NTUC FairPrice offers a great variety of fresh flowers, perfect for any occasion! I was also impressed by the wide selection of sauces, with packaging that‚Äôs convenient and easy to use. It‚Äôs always a reliable place to find everything you need, from groceries to household items.

Konnichiwa dear lovely Mardiana & bro Tian Lin,

Arigato for your excellent service for assisted me to retrieve the tax invoice & helped me to take pictures you guys rock keep it up, have a great dinner & weekend with your families always kiotsukete means take good care dears....

Best regards
Yukiko

A comprehensive mega store with friendly and efficient staff. Place is always up to date with festive decorations. üòç

What NTUC said, the seafoods price stayed put.
On 25/1/25(Sat) 9.45am went to Jurong Point FairPrice to buy Red Grouper.
Asked few staffs and they replied, fishes not yet come with various of reasons, have to wait. Okay, waited till 11.25am, finally it arrived. So surprised that they have ONLY 2 BIG SIZES RED GROUPER and that all.
One of the senior any how point the small tuna (bonitoes) to me saying that are grouper fish. OMG what kind of service? Very disappointed.
Is this a kind of promotion, no fish on sale yet say no increase of prices. üëéüò£‚òπÔ∏è
